items.title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control
items.summary: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos Policy, a new framework for advanced robot control that bridges AI agent decision-making with robotic systems.

items.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
items.summary: OpenAI shares technical details of their internal data agent built with GPT-5, Codex, and memory systems for reasoning over large datasets and delivering insights.

items.title: Introducing Daggr: Chain apps programmatically, inspect visually
items.summary: Hugging Face launches Daggr, a tool for programmatically chaining AI applications with visual inspection capabilities for agent workflow development.

items.title: Context Management for Deep Agents
items.summary: LangChain introduces context management techniques for deep agents to prevent context rot and handle LLMs' finite memory constraints as agents tackle longer tasks.

items.title: Keeping your data safe when an AI agent clicks a link
items.summary: OpenAI describes safety mechanisms to protect user data when AI agents click links, including safeguards against URL-based data exfiltration and prompt injection attacks.

items.title: Unlocking Agentic RL Training for GPT-OSS: A Practical Retrospective
items.summary: LinkedIn shares practical insights on implementing agentic reinforcement learning training for GPT-OSS, covering real-world challenges and solutions for agent training.

items.title: Powering tax donations with AI powered personalized recommendations
items.summary: TRUSTBANK implemented a multi-agent system using OpenAI models for personalized recommendations, demonstrating practical multi-agent architecture for recommendation engines.
